title: Summer Exhibitions: Costumes and Folk Art from Central Europe, lent by Florence Dibell Bartlett; Paintings, Prints, and Whistleriana, James McNeill Whistler; Water Color Drawings by Thomas Rowlandson; Paintings by Lester O. Schwartz; Memorial Exhibition of Paintings by Pauline Palmer; Memorial Exhibition of Paintings by Carl Rudolph Krafft; Chinese Porcelains and Jades; Paintings from the Permanent Collection; Lithographs by Odilon Redon
